content: lil wash cloth ig @ginger_hook // rav @gingerhook materials notes <1 skein of cotton 1 there are two ways you can utilize this pattern you can either make a wash aran yarn 50g cloth glove like the one pictured above or you can simply make a regular 4mm/6/g hook one without folding it over and sewing the sides together it s up to you darning needle 2 the size of the wash cloth is completely variable in the picture above i chained 36 and completed 19 row after which i folded the cloth over and abbreviations sewed it together the finished width was about 13cm/5 1in all you have to slip_stitch slip_stitch make sure is that you re chaining an even number single_crochet single_crochet chain chain cluster stitch repeat repeat this is a modified cluster stitch you are going to work a double_crochet and a st stitch half_double_crochet together in the same stitch to create texture yarn over and cluster st cluster stitch insert your hook into the stitch yarn over and pull through as if you were going to do a double_crochet 3 loops on hook yarn over and pull through two suggested use loops now as if you were going to double_crochet two together yarn over this wash cloth is pri- insert your hook into the same stitch yarn over and pull through you should marily designed for the now have four loops in your hook yarn over and pull through all four loops face but can definitely be used for the body pattern as well i use it to clean using 4mm/6/g chain 36 or any other even number my face and to take off row 1 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 1 single_crochet into each chain to end chain 1 turn 35 make up and mascara row 2 *1 single_crochet 1 cluster st* repeat from * until end of row last st is always single_crochet chain 1 turn row 3 1 single_crochet into each st chain 1 turn row 4 - 18 repeat row 2 and row 3 row 19 repeat row 2 construction 19 single_crochet along both short sides of the wash cloth 1 single_crochet in each row and leave a very long tail for single_crochet together fold over wash cloth with the wrong sides facing texture on outside and use the tail or extra yarn to single_crochet the sides together you can also sew the sides if you prefer to do so weave in ends
